column5: Hello Gang,  Can anyone recommend a duct cleaning company in the Bolton area? I have a feeling my house ducts have never been cleaned and would like to have them done before the winter sets in.  Anyone have any good reviews/recommendations?  Thanks,  Meely
Georgian duct cleaning came recommended to me.  Professional, friendly they did our 6 bedroom farmhouse with 3 cold air returns for around 400 bucks.  Not sure if they travel that far south? ,
